verses.text: Now \w her|strong="H5281"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w Elimelech|strong="H0458"\w* \w had|strong="H3045"\w* \w a|strong="H0376"\w* kinsman, \w a|strong="H0376"\w* \w powerful|strong="H1368"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w very|strong="H2428"\w* rich, \w whose|strong="H0376"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* Booz.

\w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Moabitess|strong="H4125"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* mother \w in|strong="H0413"\w* law: \w If|strong="H0834"\w* thou wilt, \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w go|strong="H4994"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w glean|strong="H3950"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w ears|strong="H7641"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* corn \w that|strong="H0834"\w* escape \w the|strong="H0559"\w* hands \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* reapers, wheresoever \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H4672"\w* householder \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H4994"\w* favourable \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*. \w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Go|strong="H4994"\w*, \w my|strong="H0834"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*.

\w She|strong="H0834"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w therefore|strong="H0834"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w gleaned|strong="H3950"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* ears \w of|strong="H7704"\w* corn \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* reapers. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H0834"\w* \w happened|strong="H7136"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* owner \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* Booz, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* kindred \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w Elimelech|strong="H0458"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* reapers: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1288"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="H5288"\w* Booz \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w was|strong="H5288"\w* \w set|strong="H5324"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* reapers: \w Whose|strong="H4310"\w* maid \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*?

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w This|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Moabitess|strong="H4125"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w came|strong="H7725"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* Noemi, \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w she|strong="H0310"\w* \w desired|strong="H0559"\w* leave \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w glean|strong="H3950"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* ears \w of|strong="H1004"\w* corn \w that|strong="H2088"\w* \w remain|strong="H3427"\w*, \w following|strong="H0310"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* steps \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* reapers: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w she|strong="H0310"\w* hath \w been|strong="H6258"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* field \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* hath \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w gone|strong="H0935"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* moment.

\w And|strong="H8085"\w* Booz \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w*: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w do|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w glean|strong="H3950"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w any|strong="H1571"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w do|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* depart \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H2088"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w keep|strong="H8085"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w maids|strong="H5291"\w*,

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w follow|strong="H0310"\w* \w where|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w reap|strong="H7114"\w*. \w For|strong="H0413"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w charged|strong="H6680"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w*, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* molest thee: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w if|strong="H0834"\w* thou art \w thirsty|strong="H6770"\w*, \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* waters whereof \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.

\w She|strong="H6440"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* worshipping \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: Whence cometh this \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w should|strong="H0559"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* thou shouldst vouchsafe \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w take|strong="H5234"\w* \w notice|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H4672"\w* \w woman|strong="H5237"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* another \w country|strong="H0776"\w*?

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*: \w All|strong="H3605"\w* hath \w been|strong="H0834"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* law \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w how|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast \w left|strong="H5800"\w* thy \w parents|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w wherein|strong="H0834"\w* thou wast \w born|strong="H4138"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* art come \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou knewest \w not|strong="H3808"\w* heretofore.

\w The|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* render unto thee \w for|strong="H8478"\w* thy \w work|strong="H6467"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* mayest thou \w receive|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w full|strong="H8003"\w* \w reward|strong="H7999"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* thou art \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* thou art fled.

\w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, \w who|strong="H0259"\w* hast \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* hast \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* thy handmaid, \w who|strong="H0259"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* thy \w maids|strong="H8198"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* Booz \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H0398"\w*: \w At|strong="H3427"\w* mealtime \w come|strong="H5066"\w* thou hither, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w dip|strong="H2881"\w* thy \w morsel|strong="H6595"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w vinegar|strong="H2558"\w*. \w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w she|strong="H6256"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w side|strong="H6654"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* reapers, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w she|strong="H6256"\w* heaped \w to|strong="H0559"\w* herself frumenty, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w ate|strong="H0398"\w* \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w was|strong="H3427"\w* \w filled|strong="H7646"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w took|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* leavings.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* \w from|strong="H6965"\w* thence, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w glean|strong="H3950"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ears \w of|strong="H0559"\w* corn \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w*. \w And|strong="H6965"\w* Booz \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w his|strong="H6680"\w* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: If \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w would|strong="H0559"\w* \w even|strong="H1571"\w* reap \w with|strong="H6965"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w*, hinder \w her|strong="H0996"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1571"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* fall \w some|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w your|strong="H4480"\w* handfuls \w of|strong="H4480"\w* purpose, \w and|strong="H1571"\w* \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* \w them|strong="H4480"\w*, \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H1571"\w* \w gather|strong="H3950"\w* \w them|strong="H4480"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* shame, \w and|strong="H1571"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* man \w rebuke|strong="H1605"\w* \w her|strong="H1571"\w* \w when|strong="H4480"\w* \w she|strong="H3808"\w* gathereth \w them|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w She|strong="H0834"\w* \w gleaned|strong="H3950"\w* \w therefore|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*: \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w beating|strong="H2251"\w* \w out|strong="H2251"\w* \w with|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* rod \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w threshing|strong="H2251"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w gleaned|strong="H3950"\w*, \w she|strong="H0834"\w* found \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w measure|strong="H0374"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* ephi \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w barley|strong="H8184"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w*, three bushels:

\w Which|strong="H0834"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w took|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w returned|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* shewed \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* mother \w in|strong="H0935"\w* law: moreover \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w remains|strong="H3498"\w* \w of|strong="H0935"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* meat, wherewith \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w been|strong="H0834"\w* filled.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w her|strong="H5046"\w* mother \w in|strong="H3117"\w* law \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H5046"\w*: \w Where|strong="H0834"\w* hast thou \w gleaned|strong="H3950"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w where|strong="H0834"\w* hast thou wrought? \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w had|strong="H0834"\w* pity \w on|strong="H3117"\w* thee. \w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w her|strong="H5046"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* wrought: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w called|strong="H0559"\w* Booz.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Noemi \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w because|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* shewed \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath kept \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* again \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5288"\w* \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* charged \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w should|strong="H0518"\w* keep \w close|strong="H1692"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* reapers, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* corn \w should|strong="H0518"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* reaped.

\w And|strong="H7704"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* mother \w in|strong="H0413"\w* law \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*: \w It|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thee, \w my|strong="H3318"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* reap \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w maids|strong="H5291"\w*, lest \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w man’s|strong="H0312"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* some \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H7704"\w* resist thee.

\w So|strong="H3427"\w* \w she|strong="H5704"\w* kept \w close|strong="H1692"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w maids|strong="H5291"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Booz: \w and|strong="H3427"\w* continued \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w glean|strong="H3950"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w them|strong="H3615"\w*, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w* \w were|strong="H3427"\w* laid \w up|strong="H5704"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* barns.
